nodes.text: Smashball was a sport played in the galaxy. During the Republic Era, the fifteen-year-old human Mon Mothma discovered smashball during a winter season.

In the current Star Wars canon, smashball was first mentioned in Alexander Freed's novelization of the 2016 Anthology film, Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, smashball was first mentioned in Barbara Hambly's 1995 novel Children of the Jedi.
